title: New: Hundred Waters – Xtalk
body:
The new Hundred Waters album is shaping up to be one of the records of the year.

With the stunning [_Cavity_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/27520-video-hundred-waters-cavity/) and [_Down From The Rafters_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/26902-new-hundred-waters-rafters/) already heard, they’ve released _Xtalk_, another cut taken from the 12 track LP, The Moon Rang Like A Bell, out 27 May. Maintaining the elegance and composure of their debut LP, yet intertwining it with a bolder, potentially more anthemic sound, Xtalk is otherworldly good.
